text: Seems like a custom module. I hope/assume it's a global element or a coded solution. So to change it you have to have the ability to edit global elements. For a coded solution you should head over to the design tools, look for the module and add your desired content

Hi <@U03AKL6Q1B2>

Sorry for the late reply, I didn't see any notification.

The dnd area wasn't in the blog template. It was in a partial (call-to-action.html) which was within my site footer (footer.html).

When I moved the dnd area from the partial directly into footer.html the error goes away.

My guess is that the partial in the footer was somehow being registered as in the blog template.
